英文解釋: at the beginning of, in the early part of
from … on(used after nouns of time and place)
used after a verb to indicate motion toward a lower or nearer position
under the condition of, under, beneath, below
later, behind, at the back of, after
afterwards, later, future, in the future, hereafter
langsyne, ago, in the past, formerly, prevenient, before, previously
